oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Celebration - Earl Scruggs Birthday - 2004-01-06
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: 80th Birthday celebration for Earl Scruggs from the Ford Theater at the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum on January 6, 2004.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Vince Gill; David Bennett; Bill Purcell; Charles Derrington; Porter Wagoner; Dwight Yoakam; Billy Bob Thornton; Earl Scruggs; Louise Scruggs;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Recording begins in progress. Includes audio from video recordings. Opening comments and introductions by Kyle Young. Vince Gill salutes Scruggs -- David Bennett salutes Scruggs on behalf of Tennessee Governor Phillip Bredesen and presents proclamation from the Governor -- Mayor Bill Purcell salutes Scruggs and presents banjo as a token of gratitude from the citizens of Nashville -- Kyle Young reads messages to Scruggs -- Charlie Derrington salutes Scruggs and presents Scruggs with limited edition Gibson Banjo -- Porter Wagoner salutes Scruggs -- Kyle Young reads messages -- Audio recording of birthday message from Dwight Yoakam -- Audio recording of birthday message from Billy Bob Thornton as Carl Childers -- Audio recording of Martha White flour theme song from Flatt and Scruggs Martha White Grand Ole Opry television show -- Audio recording of Groundspeed from the Flatt and Scruggs Martha White Grand Ole Opry television show --
Bud Wendell salutes Scruggs and presents Scruggs with birthday card -- Performance of Happy Birthday song -- Foggy Mountain Breakdown -- Earl and Louise Scruggs closing comments.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Gill, Vince; Bennett, David; Purcell, Bill; Derrington, Charles; Wagoner, Porter; Yoakam, Dwight; Thornton, Billy Bob; Scruggs, Louise; Scruggs, Earl, 1924-2012; Country Music Hall of Fame & Museum (Nashville, Tenn.);
